info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 1:53PM CDT until July 02 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT FOR WILLIAMSON AND WESTERN SALINE COUNTIES... At 153 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Marion, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Marion, Herrin, Harrisburg, Carterville, Johnston City, Crainville, Energy, Pittsburg, Carrier Mills, Whiteash, Williamson County Regional Airport and Spillertown. This includes Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 46 and 59. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
